system.description: Mind fog produces a bank of thin mist that weakens the mental resistance of those caught in it. Creatures in the fog take -10 penalties on Wisdom checks and Will saves. A creature that succeeds on its save is unaffected. The fog is stationary and lasts 30 minutes. Mind fog counters and dispels mind-affecting spells of 3rd level or lower. Mind fog can be made permanent with a permanency spell.

components.materialDescription: A handful of wool or similar substance.

system.target: Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
